title: It‚Äôs like a personal assistant that knows a bit of everything
text: I recommend most people take courses in pro into engineering to know how to communicate with the AI. Because that is a game changer. ChatGPT has boosted my productivity level significantly. It‚Äôs like a personal assistant that knows a little bit of everything and it helps me follow through with my ideas. It helped me start an follow through on a couple of projects because I can ask it questions when I feel stuck or conversate to either agree/disagree with what it says, or to get to know why he said what he said. I have overall found it helpful in all tasks even menial tasks like listing a couple of food items I have and telling the bot to make a meal with it. Making me save money and eat healthy.

title: Totally recommend‚Ä¶ But there is a problem.
text: ChatGPT is a life saver. If you‚Äôre in high school like me, you would know that the stuff that we do is pretty difficult. I use ChatGPT for essays, written responses (I do online class) and sometimes science and biology. But‚Ä¶ ChatGPT is pretty bad at mathematics. I tried doing logarithms with it and it made me fail my paper. I thought it was right, so I confronted my mathematic teacher and told them that they graded it wrong. But‚Ä¶ They didn‚Äôt. THE WHOLE THING WAS WRONG!!! I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just bad at logarithms and calculus or if it‚Äôs just bad‚Ä¶ But other than that it‚Äôs pretty good if you‚Äôre in school.

title: LOVE IT, but
text:
I love using ChatGPT and I have the premium subscription. However the question cap limit holds back my 5 star review. I understand it is to protect server integrity and distribute resources but until the company has grown enough it‚Äôll still be an amazing 4 stars. 
But don‚Äôt worry! Get the app, it‚Äôs literally everything you ever wanted, just capped at 40 questions per 3 hrs at this time.

title: A slight continuation

title: AI has changed my life
text:
Thank you AI for helping me understand the world around me in simplified terms. I use this to read legal documents that otherwise confuse me. It has helped verbalize what I want to say in a clear manner. I can also rely on, mostly accurate information. 

It has literally enhanced my life.

title: Reliable and Versatile AI Companion
text: ChatGPT has been an incredibly useful tool for me. Whether I need quick answers to questions, assistance with brainstorming, or just want to engage in interesting conversations, ChatGPT delivers every time. The interface is intuitive and easy to use, and I appreciate the diverse range of topics and information available. The responses are consistently helpful and well-articulated. Overall, I highly recommend ChatGPT to anyone looking for a reliable and versatile AI companion.

title: Pocket J.A.R.V.I.S
text: ChatGPT is a bit like having your very own J.A.R.V.I.S (Iron Man reference) in the palm of your hand. Ask it almost anything and it will answer with the closest thing to a perfect answer, if not already perfect. I‚Äôve even named mine JARVIS üòÜ Exceeds expectations with amazingly detailed, informative, and swift returns. Literally the A.I. we used to see in futuristic movies growing up, but in an app. Definitely recommend giving it a try. It has helped quite a lot in my personal life as well as in my career!
